category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
definition: The Female Construction Worker, Type-3 emoji is a sequence of the ?? Construction Worker, ?? Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-3, ? Female Sig http://emojipedia.org/female-construction-worker-type-3/
name: woman construction worker: medium-light skin tone

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00022076n: Tradesman, labourer, or professional employed in the physical construction of the built environment
A worker skilled in building offices or dwellings etc.
Employee working at a physical construction.
A construction worker is a tradesman, laborer, or professional employed in the physical construction of the built environment and its infrastructure.

bn:00013723n: Or the erection of a building
Building construction is the process of preparing for and forming buildings and building systems.
Process that consists of the building or assembling of infrastructure

The construction, rehabilitation, alteration, conversion, extension, demolition or repair of buildings, highways, or other changes or improvement to real property, including facilities providing utility services.
The act or process of building.

apple_vendor_description: The woman construction worker emoji on Apple devices presents a determined individual with a medium-light skin tone, clad in a vibrant, safety-orange hard hat and a sturdy work vest over a denim shirt. Apple's design language imbues her with a sense of capability and strength, featuring realistic lighting that casts subtle shadows and highlights on her features and attire. Her posture is confident and ready for action, making this emoji on Apple devices ideal for representing hard work, determination, and professional achievement in construction or any demanding field.
